document_data.name: Ssalangan
document_data.mainbody: '''Ssalangan''' was a [[white dragon]]{{cite book/Dragons of Faerun|156}} who worked under [[Sammaster]] during the [[Rage of Dragons]] of {{yearlink|1373}}.
document_data.Personality: While Ssalangan recognized that the Rage of Dragons was overwhelming, he was still reluctant and unhappy about the idea that transformation into a [[dracolich]] would be needed to overcome it. He was somewhat absent-minded, at least compared to his immediate superior.
document_data.Relationships: Ssalangan aided [[Zethrindor]] in the conquest of [[Sossal]], both under [[Iyraclea]] and after her death.
